titleStmt.title: His Majestie's gracious speech, together with the Lord Chancellor's, to both Houses of Parliament; on Saturday the 29th day of December, 1660. Being the day of their dissolution. As also, that of the speaker of the Honorable House of Commons, at the same time.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
Clarendon, Edward Hyde, Earl of, 1609-1674.
Grimston, Harbottle, Sir, 1603-1685.
England and Wales. Parliament.
England and Wales. Lord Chancellor's Dept.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Bill, Printer to the Kings most excellent Majesty,

notesStmt.note: Lord Chancellor = Edward Hyde, Earl of Clarendon; Speaker of the House of Commons = Sir Harbottle Grimston.
At foot of title page: Cum Privilegio.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
